flags.description: Show your flags or that of another specific user.

user.name: user
user.description: Show the flags of the user.

donate.description: Get information about donations for the bot.

commands.description: Get the list of bot commands or information about a command.

invite.description: Get the recommended Filo's invite link.

privacy.description: Get the link to Filo's Privacy Policy.

terms.description: Get the link to Filo's Terms of Conditions.

twitter.description: Get the link to Filo's Twitter.

status.description: Get the link to Filo's Status page.

website.description: Get the link to Filo's Website.

github.description: Get the link to Filo's GitHub.

discord.description: Get the link to Filo's Discord Server.

wiki.description: Get the link to Filo's Wiki.

help.description: Get basic help on the bot.

support.description: Get information on how to receive support.

vote.description: Get the link to Filo's voting pages.

votes.description: Get the vote counter of all Filo's voting pages.

cluster.description: Get information about the current Filo's cluster.

ping.description: Get the latency from Filo and from the Discord API.

roles.description: Manage roles in an advanced way.

muted.description: Create or set the Muted role in the settings.

role.name: role
role.description: ミュートされた役割 (設定する場合で、作成しない場合)。

remove.description: Remove all the parameters of a role from the settings.

role.name: role
role.description: すべてのパラメータ (プロパティとパーミッション) を削除したいロール。

permissions.description: Manage the permissions of each role.

permission.name: permission
permission.description: Permission that you want to add, set, or remove.

view.description: Get the settings of the guild roles.

reset.description: モジュールの設定を元に戻す (データの復旧はできません)。

confirmation.name: confirmation
confirmation.description: Are you really sure you want to reset the data for this module?

dm-notifications.description: Enable or disable notifications for moderation actions.

action.name: action
action.description: Action you want to carry out.

view.description: View the settings of the moderation parameters module.
